content:
The notepad++ plugin is about to undergo a major upgrade. It will support the following for versions 2, 3 and 4:
- editing / validating
- FHIRPath execution + debugging
- reading and updating from servers (including smart servers)
- converting between versions
- code generation (java and pascal for now)

I'm looking for one or two volunteers to road test the new plug-in for me...

If nobody up to now want to road the plug-in, I would volunteer.
I might be not the best to test it, but I would like to try.
Iâ€™d love to give the Notepad++ plug-in a try, @Grahame Grieve
well, there's an old message. see http://www.healthintersections.com.au/FhirServer

Hi! Does anyone seen this error from FHIR notepad++ plugin?: [ Error validating: Socket Error # 10060 Connection timed out.] Yesterday I had no problem validating resources with the plugin but today I keep getting this error.
terminology server is down; I'm working on it
